# VMs specs

Set 1 has 10 VMs.

Set 2 has all groups, making a total of 30 VMs (5 VMs each)

| **Group** | **CPU Cores** | **RAM (GB)** | **Bandwidth (Mbps)** |
|-----------|---------------|--------------|----------------------|
| Set 1     | 2             | 4            | 50                   |
| Group A   | 2             | 6            | 100                  |
| Group B   | 4             | 8            | 75                   |
| Group C   | 6             | 4            | 50                   |
| Group D   | 4             | 6            | 100                  |
| Group E   | 6             | 8            | 75                   |
| Group F   | 2             | 4            | 75                   |
